page.title: 19BRAMBLETYE M & EARLSWOOD F
page.content: {Brambletye Middle School}opened 13 years ago .They have over{300}children and numbers are increasing .They have a smart maroon and grey uniform . The school is very well equipped with gym ,extensive fields ,large library and French room .There are many clubs .At{12}most of the children go to the Warwick School or Woodhatch. {Earlswood First School}was opened in {1908}.There are two parts to the school -the nursery which takes children from{3-5}and the main school which takes them from{5-8}. There are over{200}children altogether and there are{10}teachers . The school is expanding . They have{2}libraries and {1} computer ,though they might be getting another one .
